snippet: The Slap Shot contributor Christopher Botta talks hockey with Jim Devellano, the senior vice president of the Red Wings and the former assistant general manager of the Islanders.
abstract: The Slap Shot contributor Christopher Botta talks hockey with Jim Devellano, the senior vice president of the Red Wings and the former assistant general manager of the Islanders.
lead_paragraph: The Slap Shot contributor Christopher Botta talks hockey with Jim Devellano, the senior vice president of the Red Wings and the former assistant general manager of the Islanders. Also, Brian Compton of NHL.com and Adam Rotter of SNYRangersBlog join in. Topics include Rangers Coach John Tortorella, the Islanders' John Tavares, Bruins-Devils and the N.H.L. draft.
